steps.name: And click on Rates
Then click on rate margin
And Click on create margin
And select "FCL" from service type dropdown
And select "All" from rate unit dropdown
And select "10FT/DRY" from dropdown
And select customer "Sneaker Company" from lookup dropdown
And select hs "1" from lookup dropdown
And select on "Flammable gas" from lookup dropdown
And Click on checkbox of is dangerous cargo
And Click on "Oman" and select from lookup dropdown
And select "Ibri" code
And Enter valid "2890096335" in load postcode
And select and click "United Arab Emirates" from lookup dropdown
And select the discharge "Dubai" from lookup dropdown
And Enter valid "10" in margin
And select the "USD" from lookup dropdown
And click on is percentage checkbox
And choose valid date From
And choose valid date To
Then click on save button of margin
And verify the "Rate margin has been created."

fullName: Verify the TMS functionality: The user should be able to create margin sucessfully
